tool_description: Get the distance between two coordinates
title: Geolocation - Distances, places ...

api_list.name: getDistance
api_list.description: Get the distance between two coordinates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geolocation-distances-places.p.rapidapi.com/getDistance/?latitude1=-21.779940&longitude1=-43.359451&latitude2=-21.756387&longitude2=-43.349595"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geolocation-distances-places.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
